name: Flag Runner
descriptions: Whenever a friendly minion dies, gain +1 Attack.

name: Acherus Veteran
descriptions: Battlecry: Give a friendly minion +1 Attack.

name: Acornbearer
descriptions: Deathrattle: Add two 1/1 Squirrels into your hand.

name: Adorable Infestation
descriptions: Give a minion +1/+1. Summon a 1/1 Cub. Add a Cub to your hand.

name: Aeon Reaver
descriptions: Battlecry: Deal damage to a minion equal to its Attack.

name: Flamereaper
descriptions: Also damages the minions next to whomever your hero attacks.

name: Proving Grounds
descriptions: Summon two minions from your deck. They fight!

name: Raging Felscreamer
descriptions: Battlecry: The next Demon you play costs (2) less.
